name: Global Game Jam 20 Mauritius Infotainment
description:
Note: This is not a game but more like an informational interactive guide.

The first Mauritian Global Game Jam is open at Lakaz d'Art. This game explains the concept of a Jam, gives some tips and all the details concerning the dates and schedule.

Talk to characters, open documents and even play a visual novel inside the game! If you want to play the visual novel as a standalone (and access some extras) hop right there : Mauritius Atoll Visual Novel

The game has buttons linking to the Registration website, the Facebook Event and the Mauritius Gamedev Discord (reserved for Mauritians)

----

If you ever find typos or bugs, leave a comment or contact me.
